mapper.select: WITH RankedShop AS ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (id) * FROM ${scheme}.shop ORDER BY id, vid DESC ) SELECT RankedShop.id AS "shopId", RankedShop.name, RankedShop.currency, RankedShop.status, RankedShop.account AS account, RankedShop.provided_amount AS "providedAmount", RankedShop.used_amount AS "usedAmount", RankedShop.refunded_amount AS "refundedAmount" FROM RankedShop ORDER BY RankedShop.id, RankedShop.vid DESC LIMIT ${pageSize} OFFSET (${pageNumber} - 1) * ${pageSize};

WITH RankedShop AS ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (id) * FROM ${scheme}.shop ORDER BY id, vid DESC ), RowInfo AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM RankedShop ) SELECT RowInfo.total_count as "totalCount", CEIL(CAST(RowInfo.total_count AS FLOAT) / ${pageSize}) AS "totalPages" FROM RowInfo;
